Name: Geronima
description:
Geronima, aged 61, is a married woman and a mother of nine grown-up children. She lives with her family in Talibon, Bohol. 

Geronima has been engaged in a pig raising business for more than eleven years now. She also earns additional income through farming. Her husband works as a carpenter. 

She is asking for a loan to buy animal feed for the pigs and fertilizer for the farm. This loan will be a great help for Geronima in augmenting her income and profit.
